title: [Twilight Hall, Gazebo]
description: Light and airy, the gazebo's tall ceiling has a large, slow-moving fan that is powered by an intricate pulley, rope, and gear system off to one side, and several cherry wood-framed silk screens, painted with natural scenes, help block some of the elements from reaching the gazebo's interior.  From this vantage point, the moon-shadowed garden surrounding the gazebo reveals a carefully crafted pattern designed to restore harmony and balance.

Light and airy, the gazebo's tall ceiling has a large, slow-moving fan that is powered by an intricate pulley, rope, and gear system off to one side, and several cherry wood-framed silk screens, painted with natural scenes, help block some of the elements from reaching the gazebo's interior.  From this vantage point, the sunlit garden surrounding the gazebo reveals a carefully crafted pattern designed to restore harmony and balance.
